name: dde
description:
Deepin New Desktop Environment - Next
 This is a meta package depends Deepin New Desktop Envrionment.
 .
 You can safety remove it after installed.

changelog.15.3+3:
1. [Dock] The location of the dock is now adjustable to left, right, up and down
2. [Dock] The size of the icons can be changed to large, medium and small
3. [Dock] Kept Fashion and Efficient mode
4. [Dock] Merged power plugin with shutdown button
5. [Dock] The time icon is the entry of Deepin Calendar
6. [Dock] Optimized plugins for network, audio, mounting and so on
7. [Dock] Optimized management of dock tray
8. [Wallpaper] Now the entry of settings is the desktop context menu
9. [Wallpaper] Now it supports real-time preview of wallpaper
10. [Wallpaper] One-click setting both desktop and lock screen background
11. [Control Center] System update details can be viewed now
12. [Control Center] Added offline system update
13. [Control Center] Added animation for system updating status

1.【任务栏】新增上、下、左、右四个位置可调整
2.【任务栏】新增图标大、中、小三种大小规模可调整
3.【任务栏】保留时尚模式和高效模式两种模式
4.【任务栏】合并电源插件和关机按钮
5.【任务栏】点击时间图标，弹出日历应用
6.【任务栏】优化网络插件、声音插件、挂载插件等一系列插件组
7.【任务栏】：优化任务栏托盘管理
8.【壁纸】设置入口变化为桌面右键菜单
9.【壁纸】新增壁纸设置实时预览
10.【壁纸】快速设置桌面壁纸和锁屏壁纸
11.【控制中心】：新增系统更新日志详情
12.【控制中心】：新增系统离线更新功能
13.【控制中心】：新增系统更新状态动画说明
changelog.3.0+11:
1.【任务栏】新增上、下、左、右四个位置可调整
2.【任务栏】新增图标大、中、小三种大小规模可调整

9.【壁纸】新增壁纸设置实时预览

11.【控制中心】：新增系统更新日志详情
